titleStmt.title: Euthymiæ raptus; or The teares of peace with interlocutions. By Geo. Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Rich. Bonian, and H. Walley: and are to be solde at the spread-eagle, neere the great north-door of S. Pauls Church,

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
